Headline: #47 47th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 47th/Pualina
ShortDescription: Westbound 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via: 47th, Ashland, 51st, Damen and 47th due to, street blockage near 47th/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via: 47th, Ashland, 51st, Damen and 47th due to, street blockage near 47th/Paulina.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: CTA Train Tracker May Be Temporarily Unavailable
ShortDescription: Info from CTA Train Tracker may be temporarily unavailable due to planned maintenance. Train service is not affected.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: Information from CTA Train Tracker SM may be temporarily unavailable due to planned maintenance. Train service is unaffected.

Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Service Delayed near Pulaski
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing near Pulaski due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing near Pulaski due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
